short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZUNI's Website Annotation extension allows students to annotate on website content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fr,he,hi,h:
The ZUNI extension makes it easy to keep all your Class Assignment Annotation in one place.
ZuniLearningTree Chrome extension makes it easy to add your Class Assignment Annotation online resources such as articles and websites directly into ZUNI with just one click.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fa,fi,fil: The ZUNIâ€™s Website Annotation extension makes it easy to annotate on websites by capturing a picture of the website, adding it into your ZUNI assignment to be annotated.  Use this feature to annotate online resources such as articles and websites directly into ZUNI with just one click.
